Method to match the answer received with a regular email expression to validate an email format
validateEmailInserted() - Method in class com.example.pizasson.Controller.ClientController
Method to validate the email inserted if the client doesn't give an email the name will be "No Email" but if the client inserts email, and it doesn't pass the validation test an alert label will be displayed when the user inserts a good email without numbers or symbols the client email will be modified with the email inserted
validateLetters(String) - Method in class com.example.pizasson.utils.RegularExpression
Method to validate letters or words inserted
validateNameInserted() - Method in class com.example.pizasson.Controller.ClientController
Method to validate the name inserted if the client doesn't give a name the name will be "No Name" but if the client inserts a name, and it doesn't pass the validation test an alert label will be displayed when the user inserts a good name without numbers or symbols the client name will be modified with the name inserted
validateNitInserted() - Method in class com.example.pizasson.Controller.ClientController
Method to validate the nit inserted if the client doesn't give a nit the nit will be "No Nit" but if the client inserts a nit, and it doesn't pass the validation test an alert label will be displayed when the user inserts a good nit without letters or symbols the client nit will be modified with the nit inserted
validateNumbers(String) - Method in class com.example.pizasson.utils.RegularExpression
Helps to verify if there are numbers in the entered answer.
validateSymbols(String) - Method in class com.example.pizasson.utils.RegularExpression
